group_1.textLeft: N-no, please don't!@Don't touch my child...

group_1.textRight: Heeey, you've got the wrong idea!@I'm not gonna make you do that.
I've got something else for you to do.
Oh hey, a calendar...@I'll mark it down so you won't forget!
Well, since it's a suggestion, I doubt you'll@forget anyway.

group_1.textCenter: On that day, I want you to turn off all the lights@in your house.

group_1.textRight: Alrighty, that wraps things up for this building.

group_1.textLeft: Hey, is this what you were talking about earlier?@It's for the next part of your plan, right?
Hmm... You're just having them shut off@the lights?
I wouldn't put it like that...
It's more like, is this really going to be any fun?

group_1.textRight: C'mon, I want it to be a surprise, so just sit tight@until then.

group_1.textLeft: Alright, if you want me to wait, I'll wait.@Ex...cept...

group_1.narration: The gap between Sena's disappearances@is getting shorter and shorter.

group_1.textRight: Urgh, gah...@And I'm almost at the brink myself...

group_1.narration: You can see the whole town from up here.
I pull out my schoolbook and glare down@at the city as I mark things out...

group_1.textCenter: Today, we'll hit up here, and here...@And if we just do this...
Gah, what the hell...@Curves are tough like this...

group_1.narration: The more I plot things out, though,@the more and more issues I see.

group_1.textCenter: This is way harder than I thought.

group_1.narration: Truth be told, it ain't my nature@to work at things steadily,@overcoming one obstacle at a time.
But this time...I got no other choice.
If things keep going on like this, it's...@not looking likely that I can find@a new Witch and nab its Grief Seed.
So I calculated how many Witches I had@in reserve and calculated the last@possible day I could hold out for.

group_1.textCenter: ...The only problem is all the other Magical Girls.

group_1.narration: Just telling them to shut up and@keep their heads down would be too easy, huh...
In morality plays, evil always loses...@Well, that's fine. If anything, it's better that way...
But even if that's how things end up,@right now, I want them to wait.@It's selfish, but I want them to wait.
I kept holding that thought in mind and prayed.
